item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Avenger / The Thaumaturge
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
The Avenger

Neutral Investigative

Passive (Resolve) You are immune to death, occupation and target changing at night.

Night Ability (Lookout) - Select one of your two targets to see who they visit, and who visits them. (3 uses)

Night Ability (Avenge) - Attack a player. Bypasses death immunity. (1 use)

Goal: Kill someone who killed one of your targets. For example, you win if you kill Prince after he executes one of your targets. Can start with anyone as a target.

You will commit suicide if your Avenge ability gets prevented or you kill the wrong target.

The Thaumaturge

Neutral Investigative

Passive (Resolve) You are immune to death, occupation and target changing at night.

Day Ability (Formulate) - Decide whether you are seeking the Prince, Neutral Killer, or starting Assassin/Cult Leader. (Infinite uses)

Night Ability (Concoct) - Select a player (can select dead players). If they are who you picked with Formulate (and if you haven’t found this specific match already) you get an ingredient. (Infinite uses)

  • Prince: Saltpeter.
  • Assassin/Cult Leader: Charcoal.
  • Neutral Killer: Sulfur.

Night Ability (Detonate) - Only usable once you have all 3 ingredients. Target a player to attack them, anyone they visit, and anyone visiting them. Includes even those visits which don’t count as visits. If you are prevented, you will kill yourself and lose. (1 use)

Goal: Use Detonate successfully and survive the night. It does not have to actually kill anyone.
